long_description: Designed specifically for use with Dynafit Baltoro randonee skis, the lightweight Baltoro Speedskin climbing skins balance grip with glide to keep you traveling efficiently through the backcountry. Dynafit Baltoro Speedskin climbing skins feature a quick-and-easy attachment system utilizing a stretchy rubber clamp that fits in the notch at the front of the Baltoro ski. Tail of skin is held in place with a metal hook. 3-layer construction includes a middle membrane surrounded by plush velour on 1 side and glue on the other; membrane limits water absorption to keep the skins sticky and light. Mohair/nylon velour material balances grip with glide for great all-around performance; skins pack down small for easy transportation. Please note: Dynafit Baltoro Speedskin climbing skins are designed only for use with Dynafit Baltoro skis; buy the size that matches your ski length.
